data.title: Pervasive Technology Institute
data.meta_description: PTI consists of several centers and labs, and focuses on novel research, innovation, and service delivery in IT and informatics.
data.text:
Pierce makes history

PTI staff member first IU staffer to be an NSF program officer

Marlon Pierce, director of the Cyberinfrastructure Integration Research Center (CIRC), has accepted an appointment with the National Science Foundation (NSF) as a program officer. Pierce is the first IU staff member to serve in a program officer role and will reside in the Office of Advanced Cyberinfrastructure (OAC).

Read the news release
